name: TVTopShelfSectionedItem
desc: An item to display in a section-based interface.

items.name: var imageShape: TVTopShelfSectionedItem.ImageShape
items.desc: The aspect ratio of the item's image.

items.name: enum TVTopShelfSectionedItem.ImageShape
items.desc: Constants indicating the aspect ratio of an image.

items.name: var playbackProgress: Double
items.desc: The percentage of the content that the user has already played, specified as a value between 0.0 and 1.0.
